query.statement: SELECT CASE WHEN B.DICTIONARYNAME IS NOT NULL THEN A.CODEID || ' (' || B.DICTIONARYNAME || ')' ELSE A.CODEID || ' (' || A.CODENAME || ')' END AS TEXT , A.CODEID AS VALUE FROM SF_CODE A LEFT JOIN SF_DICTIONARY B ON A.DICTIONARYID = B.DICTIONARYID AND LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{_TXNINFO.LANGUAGETYPE}' WHERE A.CODECLASSID = 'VALIDSTATE' AND A.VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' ORDER BY A.DISPLAYSEQUENCE

SELECT CASE WHEN B.DICTIONARYNAME IS NOT NULL THEN A.CODEID + ' (' + B.DICTIONARYNAME + ')' ELSE A.CODEID + ' (' + A.CODENAME + ')' END AS TEXT , A.CODEID AS VALUE FROM SF_CODE A LEFT JOIN SF_DICTIONARY B ON A.DICTIONARYID = B.DICTIONARYID AND LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{_TXNINFO.LANGUAGETYPE}' WHERE A.CODECLASSID = 'VALIDSTATE' AND A.VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' ORDER BY A.DISPLAYSEQUENCE

SELECT CASE WHEN (B.DICTIONARYNAME IS NULL OR B.DICTIONARYNAME = '') THEN CASE WHEN (A.CODENAME IS NULL OR A.CODENAME = '') THEN A.CODEID + ' (' + A.CODEID + ')' ELSE A.CODEID + ' (' + A.CODENAME + ')' END ELSE A.CODEID + ' (' + B.DICTIONARYNAME + ')' END AS TEXT , A.CODEID AS VALUE FROM SF_CODE A LEFT JOIN SF_DICTIONARY B ON A.DICTIONARYID = B.DICTIONARYID AND B.LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{_TXNINFO.LANGUAGETYPE}' WHERE A.CODECLASSID = 'LanguageType' AND A.VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' ORDER BY A.DISPLAYSEQUENCE

SELECT CASE WHEN (B.DICTIONARYNAME IS NULL OR B.DICTIONARYNAME = '') THEN CASE WHEN (A.CODENAME IS NULL OR A.CODENAME = '') THEN A.CODEID || ' (' || A.CODEID || ')' ELSE A.CODEID || ' (' || A.CODENAME || ')' END ELSE A.CODEID || ' (' || B.DICTIONARYNAME || ')' END AS TEXT , A.CODEID AS VALUE FROM SF_CODE A LEFT JOIN SF_DICTIONARY B ON A.DICTIONARYID = B.DICTIONARYID AND B.LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{_TXNINFO.LANGUAGETYPE}' WHERE A.CODECLASSID = 'LanguageType' AND A.VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' ORDER BY A.DISPLAYSEQUENCE

SELECT CASE WHEN (B.DICTIONARYNAME IS NULL OR B.DICTIONARYNAME = '') THEN CASE WHEN (A.CODENAME IS NULL OR A.CODENAME = '') THEN A.CODEID + ' (' + A.CODEID + ')' ELSE A.CODEID + ' (' + A.CODENAME + ')' END ELSE A.CODEID + ' (' + B.DICTIONARYNAME + ')' END AS TEXT , A.CODEID AS VALUE FROM SF_CODE A LEFT JOIN SF_DICTIONARY B ON A.DICTIONARYID = B.DICTIONARYID AND B.LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{_TXNINFO.LANGUAGETYPE}' WHERE A.CODECLASSID = 'LanguageType' AND A.VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' ORDER BY A.DISPLAYSEQUENCE
SELECT CODEID TEXT, CODEID VALUE FROM SF_CODE WHERE CODECLASSID = 'MenuType' AND VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' ORDER BY DISPLAYSEQUENCE

SELECT CASE WHEN B.DICTIONARYNAME is Not Null THEN B.DICTIONARYNAME ELSE A.CODENAME END AS TITLE, A.CODEID AS FIELD FROM SF_CODE A LEFT JOIN SF_DICTIONARY B ON A.DICTIONARYID = B.DICTIONARYID AND LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{_TXNINFO.LANGUAGETYPE}' WHERE A.CODECLASSID = 'LanguageType' AND A.VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' ORDER BY A.DISPLAYSEQUENCE
